description: This is a track of the Supa Sweet trail at the Sugarloaf Bike Park. This trail is an expert trail but lots of fun.Go here for more information on hours of operations and feeshttp://www.sugarloafpark.ca/en/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=110&Itemid=135
directions: Buy your pass at the information center and take chair lift to top of mountain. Trail Head for Supa Sweet will be on your left once you get off the chair lift.
title: Sugarloaf Bike Park Supa Sweet
